member.name: T:DesignData.SDS2.Detail.ApprovalStatus
member.summary: Approval statuses for drawings

member.name: F:DesignData.SDS2.Detail.ApprovalStatus.ReviseAndResubmit
member.summary: Needs to be submitted after needed revisions are made

member.name: F:DesignData.SDS2.Detail.ApprovalStatus.NotApproved
member.summary: Has not been approved, no known reason

member.name: F:DesignData.SDS2.Detail.ApprovalStatus.ApprovedAsNoted
member.summary: Has been rejected, with notes

member.name: F:DesignData.SDS2.Detail.ApprovalStatus.Approved
member.summary: This has been approved

member.name: F:DesignData.SDS2.Detail.ApprovalStatus.NotReviewed
member.summary: Has not been reviewed yet.

member.name: T:DesignData.SDS2.Detail.Drawing
member.summary: Metadata for a drawing and access to a PDF rendering of the drawing

member.name: M:DesignData.SDS2.Detail.Drawing.Find(DesignData.SDS2.Detail.PiecemarkType,System.String)
member.summary: Find all drawings referencing the given piecemark. If a piecemark hasn't been detailed yet it will not have a drawing, so this list will be empty.
member.param: the type of mark, major or minor
the name of the mark, such as B_1 or p1

member.name: M:DesignData.SDS2.Detail.Drawing.Find(DesignData.SDS2.Database.TableWithDrawings,System.String)
member.summary: Find a drawing, and anything referencing it, based on a database table and the name of the drawing

member.summary: Get a drawing based on a table and its name

member.name: M:DesignData.SDS2.Detail.Drawing.Get(DesignData.SDS2.Detail.PiecemarkType,System.String)
member.summary: Get a drawing based on piecemark type and its name

member.name: M:DesignData.SDS2.Detail.Drawing.Get(DesignData.SDS2.Database.DrawingHandle)
member.summary: Get a drawing based on its location in the database

member.name: M:DesignData.SDS2.Detail.Drawing.GetName
member.summary: the name of the drawing

member.name: M:DesignData.SDS2.Detail.Drawing.GetDrawingType
member.summary: the type of the drawing, detail, sheet, submaterial detail, etc

member.name: M:DesignData.SDS2.Detail.Drawing.CreatePDF
member.summary: Get the PDF as a binary blob. This can be written to a file or stored elsewhere.

member.summary: Accessor object for drawing status information

member.summary: the name of the drawing

member.summary: the type of the drawing, detail, sheet, submaterial detail, etc

member.name: T:DesignData.SDS2.Detail.Transmittal
member.summary: Items combined together into a single package that is to be sent off for approval

member.name: M:DesignData.SDS2.Detail.Transmittal.#ctor
member.summary: Start a new transmittal

member.name: M:DesignData.SDS2.Detail.Transmittal.GetRemarks
member.summary: Remarks included on the transmittal cover page

member.name: M:DesignData.SDS2.Detail.Transmittal.GetProjectName
member.summary: The name of the project this transmittal pertains to

member.name: M:DesignData.SDS2.Detail.Transmittal.GetProjectNumber
member.summary: The number of the project this transmittal pertains to

member.name: M:DesignData.SDS2.Detail.Transmittal.GetAddressOne
member.summary: The first address line for this transmittal

member.name: M:DesignData.SDS2.Detail.Transmittal.GetAddressTwo
member.summary: The second address line for this transmittal

member.name: M:DesignData.SDS2.Detail.Transmittal.GetCity
member.summary: The city this transmittal is being sent from

member.name: M:DesignData.SDS2.Detail.Transmittal.GetState
member.summary: The state this transmittal is being sent from

member.name: M:DesignData.SDS2.Detail.Transmittal.GetZipCode
member.summary: The zip code this transmittal is being sent from

member.name: M:DesignData.SDS2.Detail.Transmittal.GetTransmittalNumber
member.summary: The number of this transmittal

member.name: M:DesignData.SDS2.Detail.Transmittal.GetSent
member.summary: The date this transmittal will be sent

member.name: M:DesignData.SDS2.Detail.Transmittal.GetDue
member.summary: The date this transmittal is due back

member.name: M:DesignData.SDS2.Detail.Transmittal.GetLogo
member.summary: A copy of the raw byte array representing the logo image. This image is placed in the top right corner of the cover page. If necessary the image is scaled to fit inside a 193x100 rectangle. Loadable images include .jpg, .gif, .tif, and .png files.

member.name: M:DesignData.SDS2.Detail.Transmittal.GetToContact
member.summary: Contact information for the main recipient of the transmittal.

member.name: M:DesignData.SDS2.Detail.Transmittal.GetFromContact
member.summary: Contact information for the sender of the transmittal.

member.name: M:DesignData.SDS2.Detail.Transmittal.Add(DesignData.SDS2.Detail.TransmittalItem)
member.summary: Add an item to a transmittal package

member.name: M:DesignData.SDS2.Detail.Transmittal.Add(DesignData.SDS2.Detail.TransmittalCC)
member.summary: Add a cc for a transmittal package

member.name: M:DesignData.SDS2.Detail.Transmittal.GeneratePDF
member.summary: Create the PDF for this transmittal and return it as a byte array, to be written diretly to a .pdf file

member.name: M:DesignData.SDS2.Detail.Transmittal._GeneratePDFs
member.summary:
Create a series of PDFs, one per drawing, returned as a map from the intended PDF filename to a byte array for the PDF.
For the links to work, these must be written to files with the exact name used as the key of this map. Any other name will break the links between drawings.

member.summary:
Create a series of PDFs, one per drawing, returned as a map from the intended PDF filename to a byte array for the PDF.
For the links to work, these must be written to files with the exact name used as the key of this map. Any other name will break the links between drawings.

members.member: Note that the IEnumerator documentation requires an InvalidOperationException to be thrown whenever the collection is modified. This has been done for changes in the size of the collection but not when one of the elements of the collection is modified as it is a bit tricky to detect unmanaged code that modifies the collection under our feet.

member.name: T:DesignData.SDS2.Detail.BillOfMaterialLine
member.summary: One line of a bill of material

member.name: M:DesignData.SDS2.Detail.BillOfMaterialLine.GetDescription
member.summary: A description of the member or material. For a member, the description is the member type. For a submaterial, the description is the section size.

member.name: M:DesignData.SDS2.Detail.BillOfMaterialLine.GetRevision
member.summary: Revision

member.name: M:DesignData.SDS2.Detail.BillOfMaterialLine.GetLineNumber
member.summary: Line number

member.name: M:DesignData.SDS2.Detail.BillOfMaterialLine.GetTotalQuantity
member.summary: The count of submaterials required to fabricate the total number of shipping pieces (members).

member.name: M:DesignData.SDS2.Detail.BillOfMaterialLine.GetUnitQuantity
member.summary: The count of pieces of a particular submaterial that are required to fabricate one of the shipping pieces (members)

member.name: M:DesignData.SDS2.Detail.BillOfMaterialLine.GetTotalWeight
member.summary: For a member, this is the total combined weight of the submaterials required to fabricate all shipping members that receive the same major mark. For a submaterial, this is the weight of all pieces of that submaterial.

member.name: M:DesignData.SDS2.Detail.BillOfMaterialLine.GetUnitWeight
member.summary: For a member, this is the total combined weight of the submaterial pieces required to fabricate one shipping member. For a submaterial, this is the weight of one piece of submaterial.

member.name: M:DesignData.SDS2.Detail.BillOfMaterialLine.GetRemarks
member.summary: User-entered comments and/or information automatically compiled from fields that are set to 'Merge'.

member.name: M:DesignData.SDS2.Detail.BillOfMaterialLine.GetPiecemark
member.summary: The member piecemark of the shipping piece.

member.name: M:DesignData.SDS2.Detail.BillOfMaterialLine.GetMinorMark
member.summary: The submaterial piecemark (material mark) of a material.

member.name: M:DesignData.SDS2.Detail.BillOfMaterialLine.GetGrade
member.summary: The steel grade of the material.

member.name: M:DesignData.SDS2.Detail.BillOfMaterialLine.GetRoute1
member.summary: May be a definition from routing configuration #1 that was applied to a member or material, or it may be that a user has manually typed in infomation to the "Mult. Cutting #" column in the bill editor.

member.name: M:DesignData.SDS2.Detail.BillOfMaterialLine.GetRoute2
member.summary: May be a definition from routing configuration #2 that was applied to a member or material. Or it may be that a user has manually typed in information to the "Labor Code" column in the bill editor.

member.name: M:DesignData.SDS2.Detail.BillOfMaterialLine.GetRoute3
member.summary: May be a definition from routing configuration #3 that was applied to a member or material. Or it may be that a user has manually typed in information to the "Job Cost Code" column in the bill editor.

member.name: M:DesignData.SDS2.Detail.BillOfMaterialLine.GetAdvanceMill
member.summary: The ABM page-line number (page-line) that is assigned to the piece of material listed on this line in the physical bill of material.

member.name: M:DesignData.SDS2.Detail.BillOfMaterialLine.GetLength
member.summary: The length of the material along its X material axis.

member.name: M:DesignData.SDS2.Detail.BillOfMaterialLine.GetIsLineHidden
member.summary: Determines if the line is hidden in the bill of material.

member.name: P:DesignData.SDS2.Detail.BillOfMaterialLine.Description
member.summary: A description of the member or material. For a member, the description is the member type. For a submaterial, the description is the section size.

member.name: P:DesignData.SDS2.Detail.BillOfMaterialLine.Revision
member.summary: Revision

member.name: P:DesignData.SDS2.Detail.BillOfMaterialLine.LineNumber
member.summary: Line number

member.name: P:DesignData.SDS2.Detail.BillOfMaterialLine.TotalQuantity
member.summary: The count of submaterials required to fabricate the total number of shipping pieces (members).

member.name: P:DesignData.SDS2.Detail.BillOfMaterialLine.UnitQuantity
member.summary: The count of pieces of a particular submaterial that are required to fabricate one of the shipping pieces (members)

member.name: P:DesignData.SDS2.Detail.BillOfMaterialLine.TotalWeight
member.summary: For a member, this is the total combined weight of the submaterials required to fabricate all shipping members that receive the same major mark. For a submaterial, this is the weight of all pieces of that submaterial.

member.name: P:DesignData.SDS2.Detail.BillOfMaterialLine.UnitWeight
member.summary: For a member, this is the total combined weight of the submaterial pieces required to fabricate one shipping member. For a submaterial, this is the weight of one piece of submaterial.

member.name: P:DesignData.SDS2.Detail.BillOfMaterialLine.Remarks
member.summary: User-entered comments and/or information automatically compiled from fields that are set to 'Merge'.

member.name: P:DesignData.SDS2.Detail.BillOfMaterialLine.Piecemark
member.summary: The member piecemark of the shipping piece.

member.name: P:DesignData.SDS2.Detail.BillOfMaterialLine.MinorMark
member.summary: The submaterial piecemark (material mark) of a material.

member.name: P:DesignData.SDS2.Detail.BillOfMaterialLine.Grade
member.summary: The steel grade of the material.

member.name: P:DesignData.SDS2.Detail.BillOfMaterialLine.Route1
member.summary: May be a definition from routing configuration #1 that was applied to a member or material, or it may be that a user has manually typed in infomation to the "Mult. Cutting #" column in the bill editor.

member.name: P:DesignData.SDS2.Detail.BillOfMaterialLine.Route2
member.summary: May be a definition from routing configuration #2 that was applied to a member or material. Or it may be that a user has manually typed in information to the "Labor Code" column in the bill editor.

member.name: P:DesignData.SDS2.Detail.BillOfMaterialLine.Route3
member.summary: May be a definition from routing configuration #3 that was applied to a member or material. Or it may be that a user has manually typed in information to the "Job Cost Code" column in the bill editor.

member.name: P:DesignData.SDS2.Detail.BillOfMaterialLine.AdvanceMill
member.summary: The ABM page-line number (page-line) that is assigned to the piece of material listed on this line in the physical bill of material.

member.name: T:DesignData.SDS2.Detail.CNC_Configuration
member.summary: CNC configuration information

member.name: M:DesignData.SDS2.Detail.CNC_Configuration.GetName
member.summary: Return the name of the first CNC_Configuration in the list.

member.name: M:DesignData.SDS2.Detail.CNC_Configuration.GetNames
member.summary: Return the name(s) of the CNC_Configuration(s).

member.name: M:DesignData.SDS2.Detail.CNC_Configuration.Find(System.String)
member.summary: Return the configuration with the specified name.
member.exception: InvalidValueException will be thrown if the name does not match any configuration.

member.name: M:DesignData.SDS2.Detail.CNC_Configuration.Find(DesignData.SDS2.Primitives.StringList)
member.summary: Return the configuration(s) with the specified name(s).
member.exception: InvalidValueException will be thrown if the name does not match any configuration.

member.name: M:DesignData.SDS2.Detail.CNC_Configuration.Add(DesignData.SDS2.Primitives.StringList)
member.summary: Add new CNC Configurations
member.exception: InvalidValueException will be thrown if the name does not match any configuration.

member.name: M:DesignData.SDS2.Detail.CNC_Configuration.Remove(DesignData.SDS2.Primitives.StringList)
member.summary: Remove CNC Configurations
member.exception: InvalidValueException will be thrown if the name does not match any configuration.

member.name: M:DesignData.SDS2.Detail.CNC_Configuration.DownloadMaterials(DesignData.SDS2.Primitives.StringList,System.String)
member.summary:
Generate CNC files for the specified submaterial marks and save them to the specified destination path.
The destination path should be a directory, if it does not exist we will attempt to create it. The parent of the directory must already exist.
member.exception: InvalidValueException will be thrown the configuration is not active.

InvalidOperationException will be thrown if CNC is unlicensed or not permitted in the station.
Or if the output path already exists as a file (not a directory), or if the directory doesn't exist and we can't create it.

member.name: M:DesignData.SDS2.Detail.CNC_Configuration.DownloadMembers(DesignData.SDS2.Primitives.StringList,System.String)
member.summary:
Generate CNC files for the specified member marks and save them to the specified destination path.
The destination path should be a directory, if it does not exist we will attempt to create it. The parent of the directory must already exist.
member.exception: InvalidValueException will be thrown the configuration is not active.

InvalidOperationException will be thrown if CNC is unlicensed or not permitted in the station.
Or if the output path already exists as a file (not a directory), or if the directory doesn't exist and we can't create it.

member.name: M:DesignData.SDS2.Detail.CNC_Configuration.GetConfigurations
member.summary: Return all the configurations defined in the job.

member.name: P:DesignData.SDS2.Detail.CNC_Configuration.Name
member.summary: Return the name of the first CNC_Configuration in the list.

member.name: P:DesignData.SDS2.Detail.CNC_Configuration.Names
member.summary: Return the name(s) of the CNC_Configuration(s).

members.member: Note that the IEnumerator documentation requires an InvalidOperationException to be thrown whenever the collection is modified. This has been done for changes in the size of the collection but not when one of the elements of the collection is modified as it is a bit tricky to detect unmanaged code that modifies the collection under our feet.

member.summary: Status information about a drawing.

member.name: M:DesignData.SDS2.Detail.DrawingStatus.GetSheetRevision
member.summary: Sheet revision information for this drawing, if any. If no information exists this will be null.

member.name: M:DesignData.SDS2.Detail.DrawingStatus.GetApprovalStatus
member.summary: The approval status for this drawing
member.value: The approval status for this drawing.

member.name: M:DesignData.SDS2.Detail.DrawingStatus.GetLastPlottedDate
member.summary: The last date this drawing was plotted.
member.value: The last plotted date of the drawing. Returns null if it hasn't been set.

member.name: M:DesignData.SDS2.Detail.DrawingStatus.GetDetailCompleteDate
member.summary: The date this was set to detail complete.
member.value: The detail complete date of the drawing. Returns null if it hasn't been set.

member.name: M:DesignData.SDS2.Detail.DrawingStatus.GetSentForApprovalDate
member.summary: The date this was sent for approval.
member.value: The sent for approval date of the drawing. Returns null if it hasn't been sent.

member.name: M:DesignData.SDS2.Detail.DrawingStatus.GetReceivedForApprovalDate
member.summary: The date this was received for approval.
member.value: The received for approval date of the drawing. Returns null if it hasn't been received.

member.name: M:DesignData.SDS2.Detail.DrawingStatus.GetInShopDate
member.summary: The date this drawing went to the shop.
member.value: The date the drawing went to the shop. Returns null if it hasn't been sent to the shop.

member.name: M:DesignData.SDS2.Detail.DrawingStatus.GetFabricatedDate
member.summary: The date this drawing went for fabrication.
member.value: The fabrication date of the drawing. Returns null if it hasn't gone to fabrication.

member.name: M:DesignData.SDS2.Detail.DrawingStatus.GetActualShipDate
member.summary: The date this was actually shipped out.
member.value: The shipped date. Returns null if it hasn't been shipped.

member.name: M:DesignData.SDS2.Detail.DrawingStatus.GetErectedDate
member.summary: Gets the date this was erected on site.
member.value: The erected date of the drawing. Returns null if it hasn't been set.

member.name: M:DesignData.SDS2.Detail.DrawingStatus.GetDetailFrozenDate
member.summary: The date this was frozen, or null if the drawing is not frozen
member.value: The frozen date for this drawing, if a layer outline exists.

member.name: M:DesignData.SDS2.Detail.DrawingStatus.GetDrawingScale
member.summary: The scale of the drawing.
member.value: The drawing scale, if the drawing exists.

member.name: M:DesignData.SDS2.Detail.DrawingStatus.GetIsDetailFromDrawingScale
member.summary: Determines if the scale at which a member is detailed is regenerated next time detailing is run on the member. This applies only to member details.

member.name: M:DesignData.SDS2.Detail.DrawingStatus.GetDescription
member.summary: The drawing description.

member.name: M:DesignData.SDS2.Detail.DrawingStatus.GetFileDescription
member.summary: A user-defined description of the drawing.

member.name: M:DesignData.SDS2.Detail.DrawingStatus.GetQuantity
member.summary: The count of member or pieces of submaterial with this drawing's piecemark.

member.name: M:DesignData.SDS2.Detail.DrawingStatus.GetLength
member.summary: The length dimension of the drawing.

member.name: M:DesignData.SDS2.Detail.DrawingStatus.GetHeight
member.summary: The height dimension of the drawing.

member.name: M:DesignData.SDS2.Detail.DrawingStatus.GetMaterial
member.summary: The section size of the member or submaterial.

member.name: M:DesignData.SDS2.Detail.DrawingStatus.GetMemberType
member.summary: The type of the member(Beam, Column, etc.).

member.name: M:DesignData.SDS2.Detail.DrawingStatus.GetMaterialLength
member.summary: The length of the material.
member.value: The length of the material, measured as the farthest point on its left end to the farthest point on the right end, as measured parallel with the workline of the material. Applies to member details and submaterial details. On member details, this is the total length of the member main material.

member.name: M:DesignData.SDS2.Detail.DrawingStatus.GetDetailRotation
member.summary: The degrees of rotation of the member on the drawing.
member.value: Angle of rotation in radians. Range is [-pi/2, pi/2].

member.name: M:DesignData.SDS2.Detail.DrawingStatus.GetSheet
member.summary: List of sheets the drawing appears on.
member.value: A comma-separated list of sheets the drawing appears on.

member.name: M:DesignData.SDS2.Detail.DrawingStatus.GetVersion
member.summary: The version of SDS2 that the drawing was created with.

member.name: M:DesignData.SDS2.Detail.DrawingStatus.GetMemberNumber
member.summary: The lowest member number of all members with the same piecemark as the drawing.
member.value: If 0, then the drawing is not a member detail. If it is not 0, then the drawing is a member detail, and the number is the lowest member number of all members that have been assigned the same piecemark.

member.name: M:DesignData.SDS2.Detail.DrawingStatus.GetMarkedForExport
member.summary: Returns whether or not the member detail will be listed in a FabTrol export by "BOM" or "Model".

member.name: M:DesignData.SDS2.Detail.DrawingStatus.GetOverrideDrawingEditorModelConsistencyLocks
member.summary: Returns whether or not restrictions from Dimension Settings that apply to submaterials and details are temporarily overwritten.
member.value: If true, restrictions are temporarily overwritten.

member.name: P:DesignData.SDS2.Detail.DrawingStatus.SheetRevision
member.summary: Sheet revision information for this drawing, if any. If no information exists this will be null.

member.name: P:DesignData.SDS2.Detail.DrawingStatus.ApprovalStatus
member.summary: The approval status for this drawing
member.value: The approval status for this drawing.

member.name: P:DesignData.SDS2.Detail.DrawingStatus.LastPlottedDate
member.summary: The last date this drawing was plotted.
member.value: The last plotted date of the drawing. Returns null if it hasn't been set.

member.summary: The date this was set to detail complete.
member.value: The detail complete date of the drawing. Returns null if it hasn't been set.

member.name: P:DesignData.SDS2.Detail.DrawingStatus.SentForApprovalDate
member.summary: The date this was sent for approval.
member.value: The sent for approval date of the drawing. Returns null if it hasn't been sent.

member.name: P:DesignData.SDS2.Detail.DrawingStatus.ReceivedForApprovalDate
member.summary: The date this was received for approval.
member.value: The received for approval date of the drawing. Returns null if it hasn't been received.

member.name: P:DesignData.SDS2.Detail.DrawingStatus.InShopDate
member.summary: The date this drawing went to the shop.
member.value: The date the drawing went to the shop. Returns null if it hasn't been sent to the shop.

member.name: P:DesignData.SDS2.Detail.DrawingStatus.FabricatedDate
member.summary: The date this drawing went for fabrication.
member.value: The fabrication date of the drawing. Returns null if it hasn't gone to fabrication.

member.name: P:DesignData.SDS2.Detail.DrawingStatus.ActualShipDate
member.summary: The date this was actually shipped out.
member.value: The shipped date. Returns null if it hasn't been shipped.

member.name: P:DesignData.SDS2.Detail.DrawingStatus.ErectedDate
member.summary: Gets the date this was erected on site.
member.value: The erected date of the drawing. Returns null if it hasn't been set.

member.name: P:DesignData.SDS2.Detail.DrawingStatus.DetailFrozenDate
member.summary: The date this was frozen, or null if the drawing is not frozen
member.value: The frozen date for this drawing, if a layer outline exists.

member.summary: The scale of the drawing.
member.value: The drawing scale, if the drawing exists.

member.summary: Determines if the scale at which a member is detailed is regenerated next time detailing is run on the member. This applies only to member details.

member.summary: The degrees of rotation of the member on the drawing.
member.value: Angle of rotation in radians. Range is [-pi/2, pi/2].

member.summary: List of sheets the drawing appears on.

member.name: T:DesignData.SDS2.Detail.DatabaseExtensionMethods
member.summary: Extension methods for DesignData.SDS2.Database. These are all convenience methods and will appear to be on classes in DesignData.SDS2.Database.

member.name: M:DesignData.SDS2.Detail.DatabaseExtensionMethods.Add(DesignData.SDS2.Database.Transaction,DesignData.SDS2.Detail.Drawing)
member.summary: Add a drawing to the transaction so that it can be modified. You will need to Lock() again after adding drawings.
member.remarks: This is the same as transaction.Add(drawing.Handle);
